trans-unit.source: Defines an activity-qualified location that corresponds to an activity status event in the potential execution path of a root workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 루트 워크플로 인스턴스의 잠재적 실행 경로에 있는 활동 상태 이벤트에 해당하는 활동 정규화된 위치를 정의합니다.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
Whenever the execution status of an activity changes, the workflow instance emits an activity status event to the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 활동 실행 상태가 변경될 때마다 워크플로 인스턴스는 활동 상태 이벤트를 런타임 추적 인프라로 내보냅니다.

trans-unit.source: The runtime tracking infrastructure can send the tracking service an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> whenever an activity status event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 런타임 추적 인프라는 활동 상태 이벤트가 발생할 때마다 추적 서비스에 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>를 보낼 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Usually, a tracking service is not interested in every activity status event that occurs in the workflow instance, but only in activity status events associated with certain kinds of activities at specified locations in the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 일반적으로 추적 서비스는 워크플로 인스턴스에서 발생하는 모든 활동 상태 이벤트에 관심을 갖지 않고 워크플로 인스턴스의 지정된 위치에 있는 특정 종류의 활동과 연결된 활동 상태 이벤트에만 관심을 갖습니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> defines the matching parameters for such a location by specifying a reference activity type, a set of activity status change events, and a set of conditions that can more precisely qualify an instance or instances of the reference activity type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>은 참조 활동 형식, 활동 상태 변경 이벤트 집합 및 참조 활동 형식의 인스턴스를 보다 정확하게 정규화할 수 있는 조건 집합을 지정하여 해당 위치에 대한 일치 매개 변수를 정의합니다.

trans-unit.source: A single <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> may refer to more than one actual location in the potential execution path of a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 단일 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>이 워크플로 인스턴스의 잠재적 실행 경로에 있는 여러 개의 실제 위치를 참조할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: You add <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> objects to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A> in order to define the match parameters for an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>의 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A>에 대한 일치 매개 변수를 정의하기 위해 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A> 개체를 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> 및 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>에 추가합니다.

trans-unit.source: You must specify the reference activity type to be matched by setting either <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> 또는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>을 설정하여 일치시킬 참조 활동 형식을 지정해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: You may set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedTypes%2A> to specify interest in activities derived from the reference activity type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedTypes%2A>를 설정하여 참조 활동 형식에서 파생된 활동에 관심을 지정할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: You may add <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus> values to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A> to specify the activity status events to be matched.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus> 값을 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A>에 추가하여 일치시킬 활동 상태 이벤트를 지정할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: You may add <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition> objects to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A> to specify interest in the reference activity type only for specific conditions.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition> 개체를 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A>에 추가하여 특정 조건에 대해서만 참조 활동 형식에 관심을 지정할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify interest in only a particular named instance of the reference activity type.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 참조 활동 형식의 특정 명명된 인스턴스에만 관심을 지정할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation" /> class.

If you use the default constructor and you do not explicitly set either <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> in your code, then if a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer> is later used on your tracking profile an exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 기본 생성자를 사용하며 코드에 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> 또는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>을 명시적으로 설정하지 않으면 나중에 추적 프로필에서 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer>를 사용하는 경우 예외가 throw됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: 다음 표에서는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> 인스턴스의 초기 속성 값을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: Property
Value
A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
A null reference (`Nothing`).
An empty <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection>.
An empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>.
`false`.
The unqualified name of the common language runtime (CLR) type of an activity.
trans-unit.target: 활동의 CLR(공용 언어 런타임) 형식의 정규화되지 않은 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation" /> class by using the specified activity name.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 활동 이름을 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: You must specify the unqualified name of the reference activity type.
trans-unit.target: 참조 활동 유형의 정규화되지 않은 이름을 지정해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, the unqualified name of the CLR type of a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activity is "CodeActivity".
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> 활동의 CLR 형식의 정규화되지 않은 이름은 "CodeActivity"입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> is set to `activityTypeName`.
The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>.

Value
The unqualified name specified by `activityTypeName` of the reference activity type.
trans-unit.target: 참조 활동 유형의 `activityTypeName`에 지정된 정규화되지 않은 이름

trans-unit.source: A null reference (`Nothing`).
An empty <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection>.
An empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>.
`false`.
<paramref name="activityTypeName" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="activityTypeName" />이 null 참조(Visual Basic의 경우 <see langword="Nothing" />)인 경우

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of an activity.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation" /> class by using the specified reference activity type.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 참조 활동 유형을 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> is set to `activityType`.
The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: 다음 표에서는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> 인스턴스의 초기 속성 값을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: Property
Value
A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
The reference activity type specified by `activityType`.
An empty <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection>.
An empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>.
`false`.
<paramref name="activityType" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="activityType" />이 null 참조(Visual Basic의 경우 <see langword="Nothing" />)인 경우

trans-unit.source: The unqualified name of the common language runtime (CLR) type of an activity.
trans-unit.target: 활동의 CLR(공용 언어 런타임) 형식의 정규화되지 않은 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: A collection that contains one or more of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus" /> values.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation" /> class that has a reference activity type with the specified unqualified name and that matches the specified activity execution status events.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 정규화되지 않은 이름의 참조 활동 유형이 있고 지정된 활동 실행 상태 이벤트와 일치하는 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: You must specify the unqualified name of the reference activity type.
trans-unit.target: 참조 활동 유형의 정규화되지 않은 이름을 지정해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, the unqualified name of the CLR type of a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activity is "CodeActivity".
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> 활동의 CLR 형식의 정규화되지 않은 이름은 "CodeActivity"입니다.

Value
The unqualified name specified by `activityTypeName` of the reference activity type.

An empty <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection>.
A <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> that contains the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus> values specified by `ExecutionStatusEvents`.
`false`.

The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of an activity.
A collection that contains one or more of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus" /> values.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation" /> class that has the specified reference activity type and matches the specified activity execution status events.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 참조 활동 유형이 있고 지정된 활동 실행 상태 이벤트와 일치하는 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

Value
A null reference (`Nothing`).
The reference activity type specified by `activityType`.
An empty <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection>.
A <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> that contains the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus> values specified by `executionStatusEvents`.
`false`.
<paramref name="activityType" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="activityType" />이 null 참조(Visual Basic의 경우 <see langword="Nothing" />)인 경우

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="executionStatusEvents" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" />).
The unqualified name of the common language runtime (CLR) type of an activity.
trans-unit.target: 활동의 CLR(공용 언어 런타임) 형식의 정규화되지 않은 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if activities derived from the reference activity type should be matched; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 참조 활동 유형에서 파생된 활동을 일치시켜야 하면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: A collection that contains one or more of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus" /> values.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation" /> class that has a reference activity type with the specified unqualified name, that specifies whether to match activities derived from the reference activity type, and that matches the specified activity execution status events.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 정규화되지 않은 이름의 참조 활동 유형이 있고, 참조 활동 유형에서 파생된 활동을 일치시킬지 여부를 지정하며, 지정된 활동 실행 상태 이벤트와 일치하는 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: You must specify the unqualified name of the reference activity type.
trans-unit.target: 참조 활동 유형의 정규화되지 않은 이름을 지정해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, the unqualified name of the CLR type of a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activity is"CodeActivity".
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> 활동의 CLR 형식의 정규화되지 않은 이름은 "CodeActivity"입니다.

trans-unit.source: Property
Value
The unqualified name specified by `activityTypeName` of the reference activity type.
trans-unit.target: 참조 활동 유형의 `activityTypeName`에 지정된 정규화되지 않은 이름

trans-unit.source: A null reference (`Nothing`).
An empty <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection>.
A <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> that contains the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus> values specified by `executionStatusEvents`.
The value specified by `matchDerivedTypes`.
<paramref name="activityTypeName" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic)
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="activityTypeName" />이 null 참조(Visual Basic의 경우 <see langword="Nothing" />)인 경우

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="executionStatusEvents" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" />).
The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of an activity.
<see langword="true" /> if activities derived from the reference activity type should be matched; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 참조 활동 유형에서 파생된 활동을 일치시켜야 하면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: A collection that contains one or more of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus" /> values.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation" /> class that has the specified reference activity type, that specifies whether to match activities derived from the reference activity type, and that matches the specified activity execution status events.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 참조 활동 유형이 있고, 참조 활동 유형에서 파생된 활동을 일치시킬지 여부를 지정하며, 지정된 활동 실행 상태 이벤트와 일치하는 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: 다음 표에서는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> 인스턴스의 초기 속성 값을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: Property
Value
A null reference (`Nothing`).
The reference activity type specified by `activityType`.
An empty <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection>.
A <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> that contains the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus> values specified by `executionStatusEvents`.
The value specified by `matchDerivedTypes`.
<paramref name="activityType" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="activityType" />이 null 참조(Visual Basic의 경우 <see langword="Nothing" />)인 경우

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="executionStatusEvents" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" />).
Gets or sets the common language runtime (CLR) type of the reference activity to be matched.
trans-unit.target: 일치시킬 참조 활동의 CLR(공용 언어 런타임) 형식을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the activity.

You must specify either the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>.
If you want to specify the reference activity type in a version-independent manner, use <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 버전에 관계없이 참조 활동 형식을 지정하려면 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>을 사용합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the unqualified name of the reference activity type for the location.
trans-unit.target: 위치에 대한 참조 활동 형식의 정규화되지 않은 이름을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The unqualified name of the reference activity type.
trans-unit.target: 참조 활동 형식의 정규화되지 않은 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: You must specify the unqualified name of the reference activity type.
trans-unit.target: 참조 활동 유형의 정규화되지 않은 이름을 지정해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, to specify the unqualified name of a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activity set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> to "CodeActivity".
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> 활동의 정규화되지 않은 이름을 지정하려면 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>을 "CodeActivity"로 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> provides a much easier way to specify a reference activity type when you author a profile directly in XML.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>은 XML로 직접 프로필을 작성할 때 참조 활동 형식을 지정하는 보다 편리한 방법을 제공합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> also provides a version-independent way of referring to a reference activity type.
trans-unit.target: 또한 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>은 버전에 관계없이 참조 활동 형식을 참조하는 방법을 제공합니다.

trans-unit.source: You must specify either the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>.
Gets a collection of conditions that are used to qualify interest in the activity.
trans-unit.target: 활동에 대한 관심을 정규화하는 데 사용되는 조건 컬렉션을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection" /> that contains conditions that are used to qualify interest in the activity.
trans-unit.target: 활동에 대한 관심을 정규화하는 데 사용되는 조건을 포함하는 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty collection.
You can use <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A> to more precisely define the instance of the reference activity type to be matched.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A>를 사용하여 일치시킬 참조 활동 형식의 인스턴스를 보다 정확하게 정의할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to match only <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activities with an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> equal to "MyCode", you can set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> to"CodeActivity" and add an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition> to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A> that specifies that the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the activity instance must be equal to "MyCode".
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>이 "MyCode"와 같은 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 활동만 일치시키려면 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>을 "CodeActivity"로 설정하고 활동 인스턴스의 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition> 속성이 "MyCode"와 같도록 지정하는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A>을 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>에 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Every <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition> in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A> must be `true` and one of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus> values in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A> must be matched for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> to be matched.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition>의 모든 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A>이 `true`여야 하고 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus>의 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A> 값 중 하나가 일치시킬 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>에 대해 일치해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the list of activity status events that can be matched for this location.
trans-unit.target: 이 위치에 대해 일치시킬 수 있는 활동 상태 이벤트 목록을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IList`1" /> that contains one or more of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus" /> values.
The default is an empty list.

<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A> specifies the activity status events for which the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> can be matched.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A>는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>을 일치시킬 수 있는 활동 상태 이벤트를 지정합니다.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus> values in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A> must be matched and every <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition> in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A> must be `true` for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> to be matched.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus>의 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A> 값 중 하나가 일치해야 하고 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition>의 모든 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A>이 일치시킬 `true`에 대해 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>여야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: An empty list specifies that no events are to be matched.
trans-unit.target: 목록이 비어 있으면 이벤트를 일치시키지 않도록 지정됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether activities derived from the reference activity type should be matched.
trans-unit.target: 참조 활동 유형에서 파생된 활동을 일치시킬지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if activities derived from the reference activity type of the location should be matched; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 위치의 참조 활동 유형에서 파생된 활동을 일치시켜야 하면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
